Title: Establishes a cause of action for intrusion upon seclusion
Summary: Establishes a cause of action against any person who intentionally intrudes, physically or otherwise, upon the solitude or seclusion of another or their private affairs or concerns if such intrusion would be highly offensive to a reasonable person.
LawCode: Add ยง50-h, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to establishing a cause of action for intrusion upon seclusion
